posts.post_title: WTB - T202 PSA 4 / 5 - Looking for Lot
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian Collie
I am about 40 cards into my set.  Looking for an opportunity to make a big buy at relatively attractive prices.  Let me know if you have anything for sale.

Thanks,

Brian
